description: Onycholysis is a condition where the nail separates from the nail bed, typically starting at the tip and progressing towards the cuticle. It can be caused by various factors such as trauma, fungal infections, psoriasis, or certain medications.
symptoms: Separation of the nail from the nail bed
treatments: Identifying and addressing the underlying cause
Keeping the affected nail clean and dry
Topical antifungal medications (if fungal infection is present)
